rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception Area
rooms.description: A spacious and inviting entrance hall integrated with a reception area, following Scandinavian minimalistic design with clean lines. Natural light accentuates the open space.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: A large multipurpose area combining a living room with an adjacent dining area. Features include floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light and connection to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Modern Scandinavian Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with integrated appliances and minimalistic cabinetry. Designed for efficiency and modern convenience while adhering to Vastu principles by aligning the cooking area in an auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact but elegant bathroom for guests with Scandinavian design aesthetics. Includes modern fixtures and a small balcony view.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with ample natural light. The room features ergonomic furniture and neutral tones as per Scandinavian design guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: The master bathroom designed for luxury with modern fixtures and thoughtful placement ensuring privacy while following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A modern door with glass accents aligning the entrance with Vastu principles.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room offering natural light and view towards the central courtyard.
Balcony attached to Master Bathroom ensuring private outdoor space with garden views.
Spacious balcony for the guest bedroom offering fresh air and scenic garden views.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom with Scandinavian aesthetics, including built-in closets and a private balcony. Designed to face the garden ensuring positive Vastu energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private balcony providing natural light and garden views. Minimalistic design elements ensure comfort.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom designed for relaxation with a personal balcony overlooking the garden and central courtyard.

rooms.name: Balcony Adjacent to Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A balcony dedicated to Bedroom 2 providing additional space and garden connectivity.

rooms.name: Balcony Adjacent to Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A balcony dedicated to Bedroom 3 ensuring ample outdoor space and view of the garden.

openings.description: Spacious balcony for the master bedroom with integrated seating and garden views.
Large windows in Bedroom 2 ensuring ample daylight while preserving privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: The fourth bedroom designed with Scandinavian simplicity and equipped with a private balcony for garden views.

rooms.name: Balcony Adjacent to Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Spacious balcony ensuring outdoor connectivity and natural light for Bedroom 4.

rooms.name: Additional Study/Workout Area
rooms.description: A flexible space that can serve as a home office or workout area with ample natural light and view.

openings.description: Balcony attached to Bedroom 4 ensuring privacy and natural light.
Window in the additional study area providing sufficient daylight.

note: This design incorporates Scandinavian minimalist aesthetics with luxury elements for a G+2 4BHK bungalow on a 100x100 feet plot. The plan emphasizes natural light, ample garden views, and private balconies in each bedroom while integrating Vastu principles through careful room orientation and open spaces.
